alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Franklin County through 530 PM CDT... At 453 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bude, or near Meadville, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Meadville and Little Springs around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
